pages.text: $(li)The Honey Bottle is a delicious drinkable food.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/apiarist)Apirarits$(/l) will exchange your Honey Bottles by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).

$(li)You can obtain a Honey Bottle right clicking a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/beehive)Beehive$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/bee_nest)Bee Nest$(/l) while you are holding a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/glass_bottle)Glass Bottle$(/l) in your hand.

$(li)Honey Bottles are a useful ingredient that can be used in multiples food recipes in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can use Honey Bottles to craft other useful items in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l) too.

$(br)$(l)      Food Recipes$()$(br)$(li)Honey Glazzed Gooseberries$(li)Candies$(li)Honey Apples$(li)Honey Glazed Porkchop$(li)Honey Apples$(li)Gooseberry Jam$(li)Honey Bread$(br2)$(l)        Others$()$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/sugar)Sugar$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/honey_block)Honey Block$(/l)$(li)Honey Lamps
